name: WeTTY
description: Terminal over HTTP and HTTPS. WeTTY is an alternative to ajaxterm and anyterm but much better than them because WeTTY uses xterm.js which is a full fledged implementation of terminal emulation written entirely in JavaScript. WeTTY uses websockets rather than Ajax and hence better response time.

app_page_content.heading: Instructions
content: WeTTY is a web-based terminal application for your node. To use, simply click Open on the left and login!
The typical login credentials are 'admin' and your myNode password. Once successfully logged in, you will be presented with a Linux terminal and will be able to enter terminal commands.
